Content: *p73459ra02636*do not write in this area 		do not write in this area				 		do not write in this area26  21 	many modern kitchens have an induction cooker.	 *(a)	 the idea of the induction cooker was first suggested more than a century ago.		 an iron kettle was heated by passing an alternating current through a coil wound around a soft iron core, as shown.coil wound around iron coreiron kettleiron core(source: © darling archive/alamy stock photo)		 explain why the kettle heats up when there is an alternating current in the coil.(6)
